help.desc: Get Help on a Bot Functions or a specific command.

ban.desc: Allows a user with correct privileges to ban a user from the server.

kick.desc: Allows a user with correct privileges to kick a user from the server.

ping.desc: A ping measures the time it takes a packet to reach its destination and often referred to in-game as latency. A high ping causes lag.

purge.desc: Allows a user with correct privileges to delete the last two to one hundred messages.

say.desc: Allows a user with correct privileges to send a message as the bot. If bot has correct permissions, it will delete evidence of the command being sent.

set.desc: Allows Administrator flagged users to set certain options.

antispam.desc: Sets the time in minutes between times the auto responder will answer for each response. If no time is given. Will display current setting.

version.desc: Sends a message to the current channel displaying the current bot version.
